channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-11196] Update description of -ROOT- in ref guide
item.description: Since the resolution of HBASE-3171, -ROOT- is no longer used to store the location(s) of .META. . Unfortunately, not all of our documentation has been updated to reflect this change in architecture.
item.summary: Update description of -ROOT- in ref guide

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: I tried to find all places where this impacted and tried to rewrite accordingly. Please review, Dima Spivak Jean-Daniel Cryans

Nit:

tracked by Zookeeper

Should be "stored in ZooKeeper".

Regarding the section about HTablePool, it's now a deprecated class, so we should eventually update that too (but let's stick to this jira's scope).

The rest looks good!

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12647245/HBASE-11196.patch
against trunk revision .
ATTACHMENT ID: 12647245

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+0 tests included. The patch appears to be a documentation patch that doesn't require tests.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 javadoc. The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

+1 findbugs. The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

-1 lineLengths. The patch introduces the following lines longer than 100:
+ <para>The catalog table <code>hbase:meta</code> exists as an HBase table and is filtered out of the HBase
+ xlink:href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/HRegionInfo.html">HRegionInfo</link>
+ xlink:href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/HRegionInfo.html">
+ xlink:href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/util/Writables.html#getHRegionInfo%28byte[]%29">Writables</link>
+ xlink:href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HTable.html">HTable</link>
+ xlink:href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HBaseAdmin.html">HBaseAdmin</link>
+ xlink:href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HTable.html">HTable</link>
+ xlink:href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/HBaseConfiguration">HBaseConfiguration</link>
+ xlink:href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HConnectionManager.html">HConnectionManager</link>. </para>
+ xlink:href="http://hbase.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/HTablePool.html">HTablePool</link>.

+1 site. The mvn site goal succeeds with this patch.

+1 core tests. The patch passed unit tests in .
